about_the_game:
Ease your stress and immerse yourself in the soothing world of moving. Start your own moving business and feel the satisfaction of neatly packing and transporting items. Develop your relocation enterprise and discover new tools, upgrades, and more – all with the simple joy of orderly work.

Relax and dive into the single-player experience; either way, you're in for some good, clean fun. No item is too challenging to pack, no box too complex to place. From casual organizers to those looking to delve into the minutiae, anyone can start playing and feel fully immersed. Soak in the relaxing atmosphere and unhurried pace as you pack items from apartments, houses, garages, and public places. Get creative and craft comfort. Your hands are your brushes; new homes are your canvas. Lean back, relax, and let your worries move on to a new beginning.

TIME TO SET UP A NEW HOME

Build up your business in Career Mode and take on diverse tasks across different areas. There are no right or wrong ways; no time pressure or final scores, just you and the tools you need to wash away your stress. Looking for a fresh start? Relax and replay your favorite tasks in Free Play.

EVERY DETAIL MATTERS

For those seeking a bit more challenge, try to beat your best scores in Challenge Mode! Fight against disorganization in various scenarios; compete for speed in Time Challenge or test your precision in using as few packing materials as possible in Efficiency Challenge.

GOOD, CLEAN FUN

From casual neat-freaks to those wanting to get into the nitty-gritty, everyone can pick up and play to feel immersed. Absorb the relaxing atmosphere and leisurely pace as you pack and unpack items for new residents. Stress affects us all, so sit back, relax, and let your worries pack up and go.

THE WORLD IS YOUR CANVAS

Create comfort by packing the way you want. Your skills are your tools; the new homes are your canvas. Unleash your organizing talents and transform cluttered spaces into serene abodes. Share your techniques and showcase your relocation prowess and orderly masterpieces!

name: Relocation Simulator

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: I5
  • Memory: 4000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 660
  • Storage: 10000 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: I7
  • Memory: 8000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX 3060
  • Storage: 10000 MB available space

short_description: In this game, you are a professional mover helping clients transition into new homes, ranging from well-kept estates to fixer-uppers. Explore diverse houses and solve unique challenges to ensure a smooth move.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Romanian, Russian, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support
